entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
